name: Bit-Bit Rediscovered
description:
Controls: W/S or ARROW UP / ARROW DOWN to navigate player terminal SPACE or ENTER to confirm an action or to progress story

This is a chose your own adventure Visual Novel, Inspired by my collection of chose your own adventure books.

You were exploring your brand new apartment when you happened across an old looking computer / telly hybrid. Will you decide to turn it on, or will you walk away, and what strange adventure awaits you if you do.

Made in Godot for the O2A2 Visual Novel jam.
